sect4.title: Lite
sect4.para: To use OpenLink's TAF event notification features or configure the failover retry parameters, you must enable OpenLink's TAF support. In the case of the Oracle 10g Lite Driver for Windows, this is done by checking the 'Enable TAF' checkbox in the driver's 'Single Tier DSN Configuration' dialog box, accessible through the 'Configure' button in the ODBC Data Source Administrator.
